name: Taunt
description: You are the defender, the protector, the one who can cover other with your shield.

abilities.name: Bring It On!
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of the round. While it is there, adversaries on adjacent spaces cannot attack other heroes unless they also have similar effect.

additionalEffect: adversaries nearby which should move towards the nearest hero will move towards you even if you are not the closest hero.
